data.name: Shape
desc: specifies the service of shapes in a text document
**since**
LibreOffice 6.4

properties.name: AllowOverlap
desc: This defines if the shape is allowed to overlap with other anchored objects.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.4

properties.name: AnchorFrame
desc: contains the text frame the current frame is anchored to.
The value is valid only if the AnchorType is TextContentAnchorType.AT_FRAME.

properties.name: AnchorPageNo
desc: contains the number of the page where the objects are anchored.
The value is valid only if the AnchorType is TextContentAnchorType.AT_PAGE.

properties.name: AnchorType
desc: specifies how the text content is attached to its surrounding Text.

properties.name: BottomMargin
desc: contains the bottom margin of the object.

properties.name: ContourOutside
desc: the text flows only around the contour of the object.

properties.name: EndPositionInHoriL2R
desc: determines the end position of the shape in horizontal left-to-right layout

This property is needed for the export of the OASIS Open Office file format to the OpenOffice.org file format. It provides the end position property of the included service com.sun.star.drawing.Shape converted to the horizontal left-to-right layout.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: HoriOrient
desc: determines the horizontal orientation of the object.

properties.name: HoriOrientPosition
desc: contains the horizontal position of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if \"HoriOrient\" is HoriOrientation_NONE.

properties.name: HoriOrientRelation
desc: determines the environment of the object to which the orientation is related.

properties.name: LeftMargin
desc: contains the left margin of the object.

properties.name: Opaque
desc: determines if the object is opaque or transparent for text.

properties.name: PositionLayoutDir
desc: determines layout direction the position attributes of the shape is given
Valid values are given by PositionLayoutDir
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: RightMargin
desc: contains the right margin of the object.

properties.name: StartPositionInHoriL2R
desc: determines the start position of the shape in horizontal left-to-right layout

This property is needed for the export of the OASIS Open Office file format to the OpenOffice.org file format. It provides the start position property of the included service com.sun.star.drawing.Shape converted to the horizontal left-to-right layout.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: Surround
desc: determines the type of the surrounding text.

properties.name: SurroundAnchorOnly
desc: determines if the text of the paragraph in which the object is anchored, wraps around the object.

properties.name: SurroundContour
desc: determines if the text wraps around the contour of the object.

properties.name: TextRange
desc: contains a text range where the shape should be anchored to.

There are two different ways to get newly created shapes into the text document. One of them is to use the insertTextContent() method of the com.sun.star.text.XSimpleText. The other is to call the add() method of the com.sun.star.drawing.XShapes interface. To be able to determine an anchor position for shape that are anchored at a certain text position the property TextRange is used.
This property is used when the shape gets inserted/added and becomes invalid after that.

properties.name: TopMargin
desc: contains the top margin of the object.

properties.name: TransformationInHoriL2R
desc: determines the transformation of the shape in horizontal left-to-right layout

This property is needed for the export of the OASIS Open Office file format to the OpenOffice.org file format. It provides the transformation property of the included service com.sun.star.drawing.Shape converted to the horizontal left-to-right layout.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: VertOrient
desc: determines the vertical orientation of the object.

properties.name: VertOrientPosition
desc: contains the vertical position of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if TextEmbeddedObject.VertOrient is VertOrientation.NONE.

properties.name: VertOrientRelation
desc: determines the environment of the object to which the orientation is related.

properties.name: WrapInfluenceOnPosition
desc: determines the influence of the text wrap on the positioning of the shape
The value of this property is only evaluated for the positioning of the shape, if the text document setting ConsiderTextWrapOnObjPos is TRUE. Valid values are given by WrapInfluenceOnPosition
**since**
OOo 2.0
